Class ZombiesManager

java.lang.Object
tp1.p1.logic.ZombiesManager
public class ZombiesManager extends Object
Manage zombies in the game.

      public ZombiesManager(Game game, Level level, Random rand)
      Construct and initial a ZombiesManager
      Parameters:
      game - the current Game that the ZombiesManager works for
      level - the Level of the current Game
      rand - the psedu-random generator

      Generate a random row for adding a new zombie and add the zombie to the current game
      Returns:
      true if the new zombie is successfully added to the game

      Returns:
